category: Gender Pay Gap and Budgetary Constraints | 2-2.5 Hrs
description: This module addresses the Gender Pay Gap, focusing on disparities in salary negotiations and earnings between men and women, while also exploring how Budgetary Constraints can limit the implementation of gender DEI strategies in organizations.
